price: 27. O tavo Viešpaties Veidas, pilnas Didingumo ir Garbės išliks amžinai.
arabic: وَيَبۡقَىٰ وَجۡهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wayabqā wajhu rabbika dhū al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
